post:
Simple offer for the launch of VZ7 in the USA.

Order link: https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?gid=26

All packages with 2GB or more get DOUBLE the advertised disk space at half the price when paid annually.

The 4GB and 6GB plans get a 2nd IP for free with valid justification. 

This is **OpenVZ 7**

Node is dual E5 -2630v2 8 x SAS in raid 10 + 2 x 512GB SSD for SSD Read+write cache.

SSD cache does not cache sequential IO beyond 32MB.

Full netfilter, NFS and FUSE can be enabled by the end user without any need to request it.

https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/index.php?rp=/knowledgebase/29/Enable-NFS-or-FUSE-or-Netfilter-for-Docker-Support.html
